title: Mummy Why
description: Adopted. Plain and Simple? No! A compelling true story amidst a backdrop of cities surrounding Boston, Massachusetts. I am abandoned by my natural mother at age 3 and torn from the arms of my two younger brothers whom I will not find again for 20 years. I am passed from foster home to foster home. I am adopted at the age of five by an abusive adoptive mother. A tragic event hurls me into a search for my biological family which leads me to a shocking revelation. A Once In a Lifetime story which promises a new and unique perspective on adoption.Autobiography
author: Heather McCarthy
